BodyName: Subcommittee on Landmarks, Public Siting and Maritime Uses

Items.Title: Application No. 20155247 PNK pursuant to ยง1301 (2) (f) of the New York City Charter concerning a proposed maritime lease between the New York City Department of Small Business Services and the New York City Economic Development Corporation for approximately 72 acres of City-owned land, known as the South Brooklyn Marine Terminal, located at 81 39th Street (Block 662, Lots 136 and parts of Lots 1, 130 and 155), Borough of Brooklyn, Community Board 7, Council District 38.
Items.AgendaNote: NOTE: This application is subject to a motion to file pursuant to withdrawal by the Applicant to remove it from Council Calendar pursuant to Council Rules.

Items.ActionText: This Land Use Application was Hearing Held by Committee
